name: Memory Pixels
description:
A chill game to train your memory and enjoy good pixel art...

I love making Pixel art and these types of games where you have to think more than usual, if you want to win. So I decided to create a memory game with all my pixel arts. Most part of them will be used in future games.  

If you have any feedback, I would apreciate!

CREDITS:

Music: Title: Faithful Mission by Artificial.Music Genre and Mood: R&B & Soul + Calm
